Ransome and Marles Sports Ground, Newark, Notts March contest 1st Markham Main, 2nd Appleby Frodingham. Highest placed N.E.Midlands band - Clipston Colliery. Prizes - 1st £25 and cup, 2nd £15 and cup, 3rd £7.10s. and cup,
